trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fall River
There were no other sightings in Fall River on or around November 20th 2009
Summary: Triangle shaped object with 3 round lights and small red.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was ready to go to sleep and looked out the window and saw 2 very round non blinking lights and what appeared to be a triangle shape. It moved very slowly almost like a balloon floating throught the sky. I thought there is know way this is a plane I then ran up and told my mom. I just froze and had a feeling of just knowing it to be a ufo.
